subject: Baseball
Grandparents
lead_paragraph: Bill Carter, 86, is legally blind, but sitting in the stands in Cleveland on Tuesday night, he could still recognize the Mets’ Chris Carter, his 27-year-old grandson, at the plate.
snippet: Bill Carter, 86, is legally blind, but sitting in the stands in Cleveland on Tuesday night, he could still recognize the Mets’ Chris Carter, his 27-year-old grandson, at the plate.
